mapper.update:
update letgoalhalf
ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FirstGoal = #{firstgoal,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstUpodds = #{firstupodds,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstDownodds = #{firstdownodds,jdbcType=REAL},
Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZouDi = #{zoudi,jdbcType=BIT},
Goal_Real = #{goalReal,jdbcType=REAL},
UpOdds_Real = #{upoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL},
DownOdds_Real = #{downoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL},
StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update letgoalhalf set ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FirstGoal = #{firstgoal,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstUpodds = #{firstupodds,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstDownodds = #{firstdownodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZouDi = #{zoudi,jdbcType=BIT}, Goal_Real = #{goalReal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds_Real = #{upoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds_Real = #{downoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL}, StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update letgoalhalf set Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Goal_Real = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds_Real = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds_Real = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL} where oddsid = #{oddsid} and ModifyTime < #{time}
